itemInfo.itemDesc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Iron Ore.

item.name: Iron Ore
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Coastal Cave, Coastal Cliff, Northern Heidel Quarry, Southern Cienaga, Hexe Stone Wall, and Abandoned Iron Mine. It can be directly obtained from Ore containing Iron.

item.name: Demihuman Longsword
item.desc: A longsword made for fighting threats to Humankind.

item.desc: A longsword possessed with a strong hatred for Humankind.

item.name: Krea Longsword
item.desc: A longsword crafted to meet the strict requirements of adventurers.

item.name: Steel Taritas Helmet
item.desc: Steel Taritas Helmet made by master blacksmith\nIt is lighter and more durable than normal one. It can also be used for durability restoration of normal Taritas Helmet.\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect

item.desc: Steel Taritas Armor made by master blacksmith\nIt is lighter and more durable than normal one. It can also be used for durability restoration of normal Taritas Armor.\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect

item.name: Advanced Cooking Utensil
item.desc: A high-quality tool used when cooking.\n- It can be installed in a residence.\n- Additional effects applied later

item.desc: An medium-grade tool used for Cooking.\n- It can be installed in a residence.

item.name: Advanced Alchemy Tool
item.desc: A tool that can reconstruct the substance.\n- It can be installed in a residence.\n- Additional effects applied later

item.desc: A tool that can reconstruct the components in a substance.\n- It can be installed in a residence.

item.name: Alchemy Tool
item.desc: A tool that can reconstruct the components in a substance.\n- It can be installed in a residence.

item.name: Steel
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Melted Iron Shards and Coal together. It requires the knowledge of Heating: Beginner.

※ Find Flaviano in Heidel and complete the Pure Water for an Experiment Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Apprentice Level 4 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Iron Ingot
item.desc:
A processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Melted Iron Shards. It requires knowledge of Heating: Beginner.
※ Find Flaviano in Heidel and complete the Pure Water for an Experiment Quest to obtain related knowledge.
※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Apprentice Level 4 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.
